prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Promptbook engine is available as multiple npm packages and a Docker image.  Key packages include `ptbk` (all-in-one bundle), `@promptbook/core`, `@promptbook/utils`, and `@promptbook/cli`.  Specific LLM integrations are provided as separate packages (`@promptbook/openai`, `@promptbook/anthropic-claude`, etc.).

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
